publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1882.3 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Tackling Drugs Misuse: Protecting Scotland’s Communities—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1882) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, leave out from "commends" to end and insert "views with concern the growing problem in our communities due to drug misuse; views the current provision for drug treatment and support as entirely inadequate, and urges the Scottish Executive to work with all agencies with a view to integrating services and ensuring full resourcing allowing a range of appropriate services across communities."
